website_summaries.verdict: Travel in style with this 3-piece, soft-shell luggage set made from high-quality, durable material.
pros: Stitching and material are high quality and pretty
Frequent fliers see little wear from use
4 spinner wheels per suitcase make it easy to steer and move in any direction
Trim is attractive and easy to spot feature in baggage claim
cons: Some complaints of chemical-like odor from suitcase

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of this set of luggage. And the colors are bright and stylish! The wheels drive very smoothly even when it is packed full! The stitching and corners and all of the details seem to be very high quality and the material is rugged but still very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Olympia

customer_reviews.title: better than the advertised pictures
customer_reviews.text: when i first received the suitcases they were bigger than i expected . each has two front pockets and a bigger compartment like regular. The material is very nice , and the wheels go in all directions . a very comfortable hold and can hold a lot . i recommend this for a anyone who travels a lot and packs a ton .
customer_reviews.author: Sebreena

customer_reviews.title: Durable and gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Got a relative to buy the blue/white set for me while overseas in the US. She was able to use it as her own luggage from US to Australia. It was exactly what I was hoping I would get. The material is durable and not easy to scratch. The only signs of wear I saw was on the plastic parts near the wheels - which you would expect. It's well protected around the edges of the cases too. They look gorgeous too!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Used this on a recent vacation... 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a recent vacation...6 planes in total...10 days at the beach...worked perfectly! ...and came home in one piece!
customer_reviews.author: livinlucky

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is great I have used all the pieces for 4 different trips this summer. I like the look, I like the ease in rolling, I like that they store inside each other. I would buy these again and might just get a second set in case we need extra when the whole family travels
customer_reviews.author: Tracy CA Judy

customer_reviews.title: Off we go
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first to get luggage online and after 4 weeks of looking and reading over 100 reviews I went with this one. So glad I did. I just received then and plan on using them this weekend. They are beautiful in person and move with easy. They are a great size and smell so fresh and new. Hopefully the hold up well. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Readence

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Actually 4.5 stars. Nice looking, lightweight,sturdy material with great outside pockets that I love. The four wheels on the bottom of each roll easily and smoothly. So easy to travel with. My only two small negatives: I wish there were pockets in side on the sides. Prior luggage had them and I used them and liked them. Also I wish the smallest piece had a side strap. Still, very happy with this set and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ase

customer_reviews.title: Its lightweight durable easy to move easy to steer
customer_reviews.text: I was sick and tired of dragging heavy luggage that wouldn't wheel in the direction I needed it to go. I ordered Coolife Luggage and I am thrilled with it, Its lightweight, durable, easy to move and so easy to steer. I'm sorry I didn't get this luggage years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Smith

customer_reviews.title: 3 sizes to accommodate travel; beige color stands out in contrast from the black so makes identifying very easy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my parents and they love it. The beige color stands out from the black and is easy to identify at baggage claim at the airport. This was an important factor as my parents always had to use something like a colorful strap on previous suitcases in order to identify them. The wheels and handle function also function very well. Nothing but positive comments from my parents. Also great that it comes in 3 sizes to fit my parents' traveling needs. Will update this review if something changes.
customer_reviews.author: Drunkfrombud90

customer_reviews.title: 5 fligts later and they held up great. This was a huge trip across the world ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I need luggage to take on our honeymoon to Japan. We chose this set. I filled the largest and he filled the medium one, even though he wheeled the largest one around. The suitcase was PACKED with stuff because we were staying for over two weeks. 5 fligts later and they held up great. This was a huge trip across the world and this luggage was perfect. It held so much and we did SO MUCH WALKING with this luggage and it was totally fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hope125

customer_reviews.title: Product came in poor condition.
customer_reviews.text: I opened my package only to notice that the tan part of the luggage was scuffed up in black. The largest suitcase was missing a wheel. I definitely recommend not purchasing this 3 pc luggage set.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Boyd

customer_reviews.title: First test success
customer_reviews.text: Used the luggage for the first time on a trip to the Canadian Maritime...Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, Prince Edward Island, and Newfoundland. After numerous air and bus trips, the luggage held up with no issues. Attractive, durable, free wheeling....we were very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henry

customer_reviews.title: Broke before we left the house
customer_reviews.text: I bought these suitcases for my brother's wedding present and before they could even leave the house for their honeymoon the front wheel broke off. I'm very disappointed that these couldn't make it for even one trip before it broke. The suitcase set is nice but it doesn't do any good without the wheels. For the money spent I expected them to be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: C G

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage was delivered timely, and arrived in excellent condition. I used it within days of delivery, and was very happy with my experience. They nest beautifully for storage, the rollers are not sticky, and I was able to fit 5 days worth of clothing and toiletries comfortably in the smallest bag. The trim got scuffed going through the airport cargo process, but this is minor. I'm happy with the purchase & value!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage for durability and sizes needed
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set is just what we needed. The sizes are perfect for the type trips we take. They seem very durable too!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Candy

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags
customer_reviews.text: Great set of bags! Took them on a trip to Kauai and they are holding up great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Silveira

customer_reviews.title: Broken Handle!!!! *Updated*
customer_reviews.text: *Update* After talking to Coolife and explaining the situation they were nice enough to send a replacement luggage at no cost to me. We'll see if the handle breaks this time but overall the luggage is good and durable. I would buy it again if I had to. The suitcase was great until the handle on my suitcase broke. Now i have no way of getting in contact with the seller. It would be 4 stars but the handle simply just broke which is lame.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the luggage but had to return it due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the luggage but had to return it due to a very strong chemical smell that did not dissipate over several days and after trying several methods to overcome it. It’s construction appeared well made and the appearance was great. I was very disappointed to have to return it. Amazon’s return process was very easy and my refund was handled quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tall1

customer_reviews.title: SUITCASE DOES NOT HOLD UP ON VACATION!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new suitcases and the suitcase is already falling apart and I didn’t even make it half way through my trip. I will be requesting a refund and sending this POS back as soon as I get return from my vacation. What a way to start a trip, hope this thing holds up until I can get back. I do not want to have to purchase a suitcase while on my trip!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: This is my second set of luggage. They held ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of luggage. They held together during our recent 14 day trip. No broken wheels, or zippers. My first set, of which I payed a lot more for, was unless due to a broken wheel, after one use. Airlines are brutal to luggage no matter how much they weigh. Thank you Coolife for making a set that stands up to their abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Shippers

customer_reviews.title: Still in one piece
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a couple international trips with several flights and buses in between, and it held up pretty well. I bought the dark brown color. The luggage is sleek, rolls well, light weight, but durable feeling, and has good pockets. I haven't bought luggage in over 15 years b/c my Pierre Cardin luggage has lasted just that long. The only con to his luggage is that it's not as big as the old luggage, even when it's completely expanded. I would recommend it, but for someone who travels international a lot and need lots of space, maybe a bigger set would be better.
customer_reviews.author: LadyArcher

customer_reviews.title: Study looking Luggage with TSA approval locks!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Gorgeous! Photos don’t do it justice! They do nestle inside of each for easy storage. Wheels swilled. I’m wondering it the wheels could have been featured with a collapsible locking mechanism; such as seen on portable kitchen islands
customer_reviews.author: Sweeti50

customer_reviews.title: One of the wheels on the larger suitcase broke upon ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the wheels on the larger suitcase broke upon first use, and on a cruise, no less, so there was no running around airports. We just missed the return window by three days because we are on a trip. Amazon really took us to the cleaners on this one. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: maria sonnenberg

customer_reviews.title: Delivered broken, waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Received and mid-size luggage handle is broken. Didn’t realize this until packing for my trip and so had to find alternative for trip and the luggage only has 30 day return so again didn’t realize midsize was broken until it was too late!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, large fit 2 people's worth of clothing for 10 days, and room left over. It fit within Spirit airlines strict baggage size limits. After the round trip flight only suffered minor scrapes. Tsa locks worked on all suitcases except the large (took off 1 star for that) 3 large pockets on the medium and large, small case has extra pockets and would be great for a short business trip. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a great value. I use the medium and smaller case ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great value. I use the medium and smaller case frequently on flights, and they hold up beautifully. So far, I am not seeing any signs of wear or damage. I am very happy with this purchase and I give this my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: OBrienPC

customer_reviews.title: Unique and identifiable but classy
customer_reviews.text: These bags are gorgeous and classy. They stand out on the luggage claim and also as a fashion statement, but they're not gaudy or loud. I'm frequently picked up at the airport by clients and business connections, and I always feel presentable with this luggage. I have no complaints on functionality either. Depending on the trip, I take one or more of the sizes. No issues with zippers, wheels, handle, or material. I've drug these bags through snow, rain, across city downtown's, several flights, etc and they look as good as new. 100% happy with them and would buy them again. The look and durability for the price is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase..
customer_reviews.text: Luggage arrived the next day and from what I can see its absolutely beautiful. I purchased this for an upcoming family cruise in December so I will update once we get back as to how things go. At the present I am very pleased with the purchase and the Coolife company as a whole, would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a great set of luggage at a very reasonable price..
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Barthol-Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this luggage the handle broke and would mot close.
customer_reviews.author: J. Proctor Kidwell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this luggage set based on the previous reviews. I think it was a good buy. I took all three pieces out on a two week vacation in which the luggage was packed/unpacked numerous times. It held up well and they are very roomy. They also roll smoothly. Everything held up well but only time will really tell.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is a great value!! The large bag is super-huge, and the mid-size bag is the size of a "large bag" in our other set of luggage. This is a super set of luggage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage so far
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box these are beautiful and seemingly strong pieces. Built in lock are easy to set and use. The 2 year warrenty is directly through Amazon, so no need to register. Have not had the opportunity to use them for travel yet, but we will certainly put them to the test over the next few years.
customer_reviews.author: AKDavisAK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this luggage set! It has a bit of a retro feel to it and it passed my 2 year old nephews "durability test". Both the wheels and handles move smoothly. I will be traveling from NY to Malta with this set and what I really love about it is that it does not look like your typical black luggage that everyone else in the airport has. I can't wait to see how well it withstands going through airport baggage.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got this set before a long trip to New England. We transferred from plane to train to car back and forth, and up and down lots of stairs. It was very easy to maneuver and held up beautifully. So far I'm very pleased with this set. I got the black and tan, and it's very classy looking.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable and attractive!
customer_reviews.text: Went on a long trip overseas. The luggage met all expectations. Held up wonderfully and because of the colors, was easy to spot and pick up off the baggage belt. Great product!! Dr. Mike merbaum
customer_reviews.author: Michael Merbaum

customer_reviews.title: Smooth travel
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for a two week international trip. The suitcases are so easy to maneuver. The 360 wheels made a huge difference. I’m short, being able to slide the large suitcase along with me instead of tipping it made everything so much easier and less physically stressful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How Durable they are will be proven  with use.
customer_reviews.text: The luggage looks and feels good. Usage will prove how durable. A couple of reviews mentioned handles ripping out/off and spinner wheels breaking. These are my areas of concern knowing that airline baggage handlers are not gentle. We have larger Samsonite spinners that are very tough, but also very expensive. Too large, hence this purchase. They have survived with no damage for many air trips. Hope the Coolife perform as well.
customer_reviews.author: PR User

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. The size is perfect. They're durable, maneuver easily, and are nice looking. The fact that they store inside each other is a wonderful touch. When I first opened them, the plastic-y odor was strong just as other's reviews had said. I opened them up to air out. The next day it was still strong. I grabbed a dryer sheet (do not wet it) and wiped down the inside of each including in the pockets - tada - no more smell at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5-star
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easily identifiable and roomy. Has a TSA-approved lock and 360 degree wheels. I did not need 3 suitcases and preferred to have only bought the large size, but was unable to do so. I would have rated 5 stars if I could have done so.
customer_reviews.author: SirJohn

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to replace a 15 year old set. Cost effective and attractive. Have used once and like the maneuverability of the set. Weight of the pieces I feel is pretty standard. What was disappointing is that the zipper mechanism on both the large and medium size pieces split when closing so needed to re-thread it twice. Pieces were not overfilled or bulging when packed. Coolife Luggage support has been very attentive to resolving the issue reported and any inconvenience caused. Through phone calls and email the staff has worked diligently to resolve this. Very happy this group paid attention to my feedback.
customer_reviews.author: APL

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, functional, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the set of 3 for my daughters Birthday - she over packs always - used all 3 pieces ( which came on time) for a short trip. Even though she was traveling alone, with three pieces, she was amazed how easy it was to manage them because they moved so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cap in GA

customer_reviews.title: Very classy looking
customer_reviews.text: These look really nice and stand out when waiting for luggage at baggage chute. Have used them on one trip so far and they seem to be holding up well. Well glide very easily on most terrain. So far very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Macintosh

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good and they look great.
customer_reviews.text: This luggage looks very sharp in person. Mine is the black with tan trim. I have now flown with this luggage and traveled cross country on a road trip with this luggage and they seem durable so far. My only concern is when the handles are extended to pull or roll they don't seem as sturdy as a samsonite but that's a top name brand so it's understandable at this price point. They wiggle a lot but this hasn't impacted the use at all. For the price point the look and how they have performed so far I think this is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mario M. Esteves Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and seems well built.
customer_reviews.text: The luggage arrived when promised and packaged very well. Very good looking luggage. I couldn't give it 5 stars because I have not yet used it. However, when rolling the smallest piece, it tended to not go in the direction I was pulling it. That may change when it has some weight in it. I'm very pleased with the workmanship and it seems to be sturdy. Side pockets on the inside would be a big plus. Too bad this set does not have them. I will update after we have used the luggage on an upcoming October trip.
customer_reviews.author: Bama Best

customer_reviews.title: Carry on too big for airlines!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the set, but the carryon was too tall by a full inch and is rejected by European airlines, so I didn’t use it. As well, the 24” is wasted since I only use the big one. Hopefully, the big one will be worth the price! I thought it imprudent to risk the extra baggage fee, which hovers around $100+ in certain airlines in Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Garrick

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage
customer_reviews.text: Used these on a recent cruise and land tour of Alaska, and all three pieces of luggage performed flawlessly. They are very lightweight--and durable--and excellent for air travel. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Fl_Beachcomber

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 piece set of Luggage/ Great value too.
customer_reviews.text: We are going on a big trip soon, and wanted a new set of luggage. Searched for a while , in stores and online. We found this great looking, great feature set of luggage. We just received it, and it is very nice looking and well made. The pricing for three pieces with this features and looks, it almost nearly impossible to find in this price range. Other sets are hundreds more. Great value, and we feel very good about our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas & Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Love my luggage
customer_reviews.text: Got these last year and I love them. Received compliments! Gave the largest to my daughter and kept the other smaller ones for myself. Sooo much room and the wheels glide perfectly. Am so pleased with my purchase. When they aren't in use, I re-wrap them in the same thick plastic bags that they came in. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mansita

customer_reviews.title: Road Trips
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set of suitcases that look nice when we go on road trips. So often our suitcases are thrown around at the airport and just always seem dirty. I wanted something durable, light weight, and nice looking to travel with when we take weekend trips in the car. Yes, this meets all of my needs. Awesome looking just like in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and STURDY!!!  Fits inside each other for storage
customer_reviews.text: They are much better looking in person than on the website. Also, they really do fit inside each other for storage and even for travel. We tend to take an empty bag on overseas trips for items purchased and these fit perfectly. They really are sturdy and because they are not that cheap plastic no scratching or cracks when handled.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: A luggage that you must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I colour is rich and pretty. It easy to move around. the handles are adjustable. Its also light as suggested. I havent tracel with it with but when I do I'll upload pics
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking Cases
customer_reviews.text: Use these suit cases several times and they appear to have healed up well. Once on Bus trip and then couple times in and out of truck of car a number of times. Have not taken on air flight yet. But see no reason they won’t do well there as well. Even got compliments from hotel staff handling these cases to and from motel rooms on how nice they were. Good deal for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Daughter had bought a set earlier so I was familiar with luggage prior to purchase. Haven't taken on a flight yet but material is thick. Straps are attached with double rivets and handles are thick aluminum. Very sturdy. Great product for price
customer_reviews.author: Gumbo

customer_reviews.title: Rip by zipper after first use.
customer_reviews.text: The medium sized one ripped after one flight. This came as a Christmas present to me and I am just now getting to use them because of Covid-19. I used it once and noticed a small rip by the zipper. (It was not packed full.) The other two are holding up fine. Other than the rip I am really happy with how pretty they are and how the wheels spin very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to purchase Nautica for a little bit more but it was out of stock so I bought this because of good reviews. I'm extremely happy with it and find that every piece is exactly what I've needed. I know it will last a long time as it's very durable. And fashionable in style
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, like more expensive suitcases. The medium hold enough winter clothes for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Did not rate on durability because I just received it a few days ago. Very impressed with looks, I packed the medium one for a 2 weeks trip, including a pair of boots and a pair of sneakers and it still has room. Rolls with ease. Will update after I get back from this trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sunglow

customer_reviews.title: Accurate as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage for the money. Has survived a year of travel, airline handlers and parking lot travel. Wheels have stood up well, body has survived with little indication of being bounced around. Would recommend to anyone that needs a good luggage set for a reasonable price. Zippers and locks work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace B. Mcgaughey

customer_reviews.title: BUILT IN TSA LOCKS
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME LUGGAGE SET WHICH HAS THE TSA LOCKS BUILT IN THE LUGGAGE . MY SON HAD HIS LUGGAGE DAMAGED WHILE WE VISITED DISNEY IN JAN...DISNEY DID REFUND HIM FOR THE DAMAGE SUITCASE AND HE WENT ON AMAZON ORDERED THIS LUGGAGE AND HAD IT SHIPPED IT TO OUR RESORT AND WE RECEIVED IN TIME BEFORE WE HAD TO LEAVE AND HE LOVED LOVED HIS NEW LUGGAGE. WE WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANYONE
customer_reviews.author: B. Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: This luggage arrived today. Perfect condition! Every zipper, lock and telescoping handle worked perfectly. I am very impressed with the quality of this luggage and look forward to many years of service. Many reviews cautioned about a manufacturing odor when they received their luggage. This was not the case for me. This is ready to go!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set and the price is right
customer_reviews.text: Very nice luggage set. I wish the wheels were a bit beefier because the large suitcase tended to turn while pushing. As far as looks go, the set is a stunner. Lots of room and it stood up quite well for its first airline trip. Overall, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea about the durability yet because I'm not using it until mid June on a trip but they certainly look well made. They do have a little bit of a chemical odor inside and I've read other reviews that say the same thing but I've been airing them out and spraying them with febreze. Hopefully that will do it!
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my old carry on bag fell apart a DNS’s I figured I might as well get a set since my large suitcase is tired as well. I chose this one because of the reviews so I was expecting to like them as it seems everyone else does - but LOVE them! They look really nice, feel like they are made really well, and roll like a dream. Haven’t figured out the tsa lock but I don’t normally lock my suitcase anyway so not worried about that. These are very nice bags for the price
customer_reviews.author: Taylor ewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this luggage set as a Christmas gift and am so pleased with it! The largest piece is quite large, which is exactly what I wanted for extended trips. It's also great-looking and high quality. I ordered the dark blue, and the trim is lighter than expected, more cream than tan, but the contrast is beautiful. I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: The luggage is very nice and quality is top notch
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is very nice and quality is top notch! The wheels are great and role very smoothly. Just purchased this 3 piece set and will be traveling a lot. With that being said, time will tell if this luggage holds up as advertised. I’m not doubting that it won’t last. The reason I didn’t rate this a 5 star is because the smallest piece could have been made a little different. Just to make it a little more user friendly, since this size is your carry on piece. Overall I like it and it was at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 4 star rating simply because I haven’t used it yet, once I take it for a spin I will know more. My inital thoughts are they set looks very elegant and not cheaply made. The codes were easy to set and all fit inside one another for less space! Each piece was individually wrapped in plastic to ensure its not damaged. Overall I am really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Juliea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for conventions / cosplayers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because I go to a lot of anime and gaming conventions and tend to buy a lot of stuff and cosplay. I love that this set stacks into one another for storage. The TSA locks are also awesome and easy to use. I am thinking of buying a second set for my fiance for when we go to Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Wood Mama

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Only used it one time but seems like a very nice set at an affordable price. My only regret was getting the blue luggage with white trim. After on trip on the plane the white got dirty. Other than that, I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: Romedini

customer_reviews.title: The color is nice
customer_reviews.text: We like them and they came in very handy for our trip but "Jury" is still out on the durability on these suitcases because we only used them once. We noticed the stitching on one side of the large suitcase is opening
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for a trip. It was my first set with 360 wheels. I thought they worked great! Loved the design. It’s different, but classic and didn’t blend in with all the other black bags. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Happy Traveler
customer_reviews.text: I got these in blue and the color is strikingly beautiful. I wanted luggage that would stand apart from the sea of black pieces on the belt. Feels like good quality but I won’t be using for a few months so hopefully it holds up to international travel.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay T.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, maneuverable, and great price!
customer_reviews.text: We really are impressed with this luggage. Three sizes, the smallest being perfect for a carry-on. They are light weight and easy to manage at the airport. The price is great. A bonus is the TSA locks.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M. Walby

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage!!
customer_reviews.text: Very large room capacity in all 3. Very well made. I recommend this set for sure.
customer_reviews.author: mark cain

customer_reviews.title: Ok luggage for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They are light weight. They do not fit well inside themselves. It was a struggle. They are not hard sided and seem a little flimsy. I have not traveled with them yet. I will come back after my travels.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Hodge

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP trim, too bad lovely set!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy new luggage two days before big trip! They are lovely, easy to move, nice size assortment. Trim a big disappointment, poor fabric quality, not one made it through the trip without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M. Backes

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!  GOOD PRODUCT,  JUST AS DESCRIBED.
customer_reviews.text: OK, THESE LOOK GREAT ! REALLY SHARP. QUALITY IS OK. I MEAN LOOK AT THE PRICE. OVERALL FOR THE PRICE THEY ARE GREAT. IF YOU WANT STURDIER LUGGAGE GO FOR THE PRICIER MODELS. ME MYSELF. THESE ARE PERFECT FOR ME. THEY ROLL. THEY ZIP. THEY REALLY DO LOOK REALLY SHARP.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyBooch

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, pretty durable so far!
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting to review these until at least 3 trips... but then Covid happened. For the 1 international trip I used the big bag on, it was great! Spinners worked well, zippers didn't fail and I got a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Kimi

customer_reviews.title: Great value and service
customer_reviews.text: This luggage has many qualities you would expect from a more expensive line. It looked good after being handled thru a cruise and 4 flights. It moved well thru large airports and the trim makes it so easy to spot in a sea of other luggage. 5 stars for sure
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I just got them in. They roll great and feel really sturdy. The TSA locks are easy to reset and work great. If my opinion changes or improves further I'll update this review. As of now I can't imagine I'll be disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: VERY, VERY SATISFIED!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful luggage!!!!!!! Exceptional value!!!!! You will not be disappointed. This is by far the best looking and quality built set I have ever owned. It won’t be hard to spot YOUR luggage at pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Looking good and confident when traveling
customer_reviews.text: These suitcases have a large packing area. They are also lightweight. Their only downfall is that they are extremely difficult to maneuver on rugs. Other than that, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: majestic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bargain !
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color, the TSA locks built in. Checked out the zippers, handles, and maneuverability of wheels. So far, so good. Only gave set 4 stars, because I won't be traveling with it for a month or so; will repost when/if it earns it's 5th star !
customer_reviews.author: YoMarg1

customer_reviews.title: Blue color not as expected from picture
customer_reviews.text: The blue set I received was Women’s luggage- very feminine. I needed it the day after the set arrived so I’m going to rock them out for a couple years, but certainly not what I was expecting from the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Only used once but held up well
customer_reviews.text: Traveled for a month with this set. Largest of the set I had 50 lbs of clothes and other items for my trip home. The luggage held up well for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fuqua-smith

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: The color does not really translate through the pictures. It looked to me like it was more of a tan/sand color. It is more of a pastel yellow or macaroon. It is a strange color. I am going to keep them because I bought them to share with my wife, but if I was buying them just for myself, I would have purchased the blue.
customer_reviews.author: zukpr

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable luggage
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these luggage bags. Got them for my move to Europe and they are such a great quality. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Well made and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. Arrived in good condition, reviews were made about the smell, but it just smells new and refreshing. Doesn't bother me. Arrived very fast, just beautiful ! Oh also they are very wide and spacious and looks even bigger than the picture
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE Maybe not made for airports.
customer_reviews.text: Update - a representative from Coolife contacted me and already sent a replacement bag. I have used the other two bags at the airport since my initial review and both held up great and the carry one was good for Delta. I like the look of the bags but, unfortunately, only after one use there is a 3 inch tear at the seam near the top. I know airports are not always the most gentle but should get more than one use from your luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Aarin

customer_reviews.title: STINKS OF PETROLEUM
customer_reviews.text: looks nice, but stinks of petroleum. Leaving out x 3 days, spraying with febreze, washing doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene R

customer_reviews.title: Very durable very light.
customer_reviews.text: Love the strength of the zippers. Lighter color is not good to go with because of the conveyer belt marks on it when Baggage handlers throw them on it.
customer_reviews.author: DMJ

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Every bag is made well. The wheels work great. The zipper doesn’t get stuck on anything. Light weight. Love the bags!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: side handle is not durable
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed that the 1st trip I used this, the side handle broke off. It was under the airline limit of 50 lbs. the very 1st time I used it, one side broke away from the holding bracket, could not repair it as I was away from home so used it as it was, on the return trip I picked it up from the baggage carousel the handle was completely gone, so I had no opportunity to have it repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Durability value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great love them i’ve had these for almost a year now and its great definitely durable and maneuverable definitely your money’s worth don’t even think about it just buy them.
customer_reviews.author: noemi nunez

customer_reviews.title: Look, Layout and Lines
customer_reviews.text: I haven't traveled with my new Coolite Luggage yet but it is packed, sturdy and read to go . Excellent space and structure The carry on is fantastic in its design and thought. Perfect little office, weekend bag More review later!
customer_reviews.author: Tip428

customer_reviews.title: WHEEL BROKE OFF BEFOFE I USED it
customer_reviews.text: Wheel broke off before i even used it. What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today. I opened the box and just did a quick inspection. The quality seems REALLY nice. Better than you'd expect for the price. My family and I are traveling in a couple months. I'll update my review after we get home. I don't think I'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Uriah Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: An excellent luggage set
customer_reviews.text: The Coolife 3 piece luggage set is a great buy. The suitcases are good looking, spacious and have a durable feel.
customer_reviews.author: piranha

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as you see in pictures, but better!
customer_reviews.text: Havent used them for travel yet, but these are so beautiful and exactly as great as I hoped they would be! I love the way they look, and they appear so durable and well built! Cant wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Brit S

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: I like the depth of the cases and the lightness. Since I have not used them, I can not address the durability. I will say the stacking is a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Patsfield

customer_reviews.title: Sophisticated and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great value and stylish! The bags can be moved easily and the wheels rotate making it easy for the luggage to be moved quickly..the insides are roomy, with deep pockets!
customer_reviews.author: queensrborninnov

customer_reviews.title: Love my new suitcase set
customer_reviews.text: My last suitcase set was so old that it didn't have the 360 wheels. I love my new set because the color is different from my usual color I always choose. The only thing is I wish it had a size that was smaller for an overnight stay. But all in all I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Phung

product_meta.title: Coolife Luggage 3 Piece Set Suitcase with TSA lock pinner softshell 20in24in28in (Black.)
feature_bullets: Worldwide 2 year warranty. Three different size: Size: 20inch (23 x 10x 14), 24innch (16.5 x 11 x 27) 28inch (18 x 12.5x 31), 24in,28in is Expandable add 15%to the scalable space. 20in features a large front pocket.
3color Jacquard oxford cloth, making the color even richer and looks more three-dimensional. Much better and durable than polyester material. Tough corner protector is built to last.
Multiple front zippered pockets for travel meets your different storage requirements.
Internal retractable push-button handle system and 4 silent spinner wheels provide a comfortable experience.
The secure combination TSA lock can keep your travel safety and security.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars727 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
